    • removePurchaseFromHistory

      public static void removePurchaseFromHistory(Customer customer, String confirmationNumber)
      Removes a purchase from the customer's purchase history.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer from whom the purchase is removed.
      confirmationNumber - The confirmation number of the purchase to be removed.

      confirmationNumber - The confirmation number of the canceled order.

      customer - The customer for whom the invoice is generated.
